channel.title: Conference on Richelle Jade Tuquero
channel.description: Recent content in Conference on Richelle Jade Tuquero

item.title: International School on Open Quantum Many-Body Systems
item.author: richellejade.l.tuquero@gmail.com (Richelle Jade L. Tuquero)
item.description: Participated in the international school in Tutzing, Germany.

item.title: Kick-off-Workshop FOR 5688 in Berlin
item.author: richellejade.l.tuquero@gmail.com (Richelle Jade L. Tuquero)
item.description: We participated in the kick-off meeting for the DFG-Research Unit FOR 5688. This includes meetings, discussions, and poster presentations.

item.title: 41st SPP Conference
item.author: richellejade.l.tuquero@gmail.com (Richelle Jade L. Tuquero)
item.description: Presented an oral presentation to my full conference paper about the effectiveness of positive-P representation in simulating a Dicke model in Siargao, Philippines for the 2023 SPP Conference.

item.title: 40th SPP Conference
item.author: richellejade.l.tuquero@gmail.com (Richelle Jade L. Tuquero)
item.description: Presented in an oral presentation in the 39th Samahang Pisika ng Pilipinas Physics Conference. In here, we highlight the influence of dissipation and lattice depth to the lifetime of continuous time crystals in an atom-cavity system.

item.title: 39th SPP Conference
item.author: richellejade.l.tuquero@gmail.com (Richelle Jade L. Tuquero)
item.description: Presented in an oral presentation in the 39th Samahang Pisika ng Pilipinas Physics Conference. In here, we highlight the imbalance of Density Wave states in the presence of a trapping potential.
